basics.name: Cebajel Tanan
basics.Position: Software Development Engineer at Texas Instruments
basics.summary: I am a passionate researcher with expertise in machine learning, cybersecurity, and optimization, complemented by academic excellence, diverse extracurricular achievements, and a commitment to innovation and balanced growth.

work.name: Antimicrobial Resistance Prediction
highlights: Analyzed over 10 machine learning models using more than 3 dimensionality reduction techniques on Raman spectroscopy data of 3 bacterial strains, resulting in 3 publications.
Developed an application which classifies bacterial resistance against Colistin with 97% accuracy using Raman spectroscopy data.

work.name: IP Analyzer
highlights: Developed and deployed a web application to recognize malicious IP addresses/domains using multiple sources, resulting in 2 publications.
Designed application queries and processed 150+ grey list databases using a custom metric to evaluate host reputation, ensuring the latest and reliable information.
Integrated and processed information from 9 sources and displayed it in user-friendly UI which received grants from Nvidia and BPR&D (Bureau of Police Research and Development).

work.name: Texas Instruments
highlights: Enhanced a tool for designing silicon chips by integrating new features using Angular and Django and optimizing its performance, which led to receiving a silver recognition award.
Developed a lab inventory management system to handle inventories of more than 13 types of labs across the world.
Fixed and deployed a tool responsible for testing silicon chips awarding me gold recognition award.

work.name: Texas Instruments
highlights: Designed a program which fetched and compiled information from multiple different kinds of sources and generated a report helping teams to analyze pending issues act upon it leading to 2x faster workflow.
Optimized existing scripts used for analyzing issues in the development of projects at Texas Instruments from an average runtime of 8-10 hours to 22-30 minutes.
Received a Pre-Placement Offer (PPO) based on outstanding performance and contributions.

work.name: Automated Timetable Scheduler
highlights: Developed a framework that creates timetables for institutes by considering general constraints for students, professors, campus, and venue capacity, improving scheduling efficiency.
Handled 16 different constraints on 100+ courses and 6000+ registrations, ensuring smooth scheduling and efficient resource allocation.

education.institution: Indian Institute of Technology, Dharwad, India

certificates.issuer: Badge awarded for completing Google Cybersecurity Course

certificates.issuer: 12th Inter IIT Tech Meet hosted by IIT Madras

certificates.name: ICEI Certificate
certificates.issuer: Awarded for presenting paper and poster at IEEE Conference on Engineering Informatics (ICEI), Dharwad

certificates.name: Indo-Finnish Joint Course Certificate
certificates.issuer: Awarded for delivering a lecture on significance of Game Theory in sustainable development at Indo-Finnish Joint Course 2024.

publications.name: Combating Antimicrobial Resistance: Spectroscopy Meets Machine Learning.
A Tool for Comprehensive IP Address Analysis
publications.publisher: 17th International Conference on COMmunication Systems & NETworkS Demo Track

publications.name: A Multi-Functional Web Tool for Comprehensive Threat Detection Through IP Address Analysis
publications.publisher: IEEE Conference on Engineering Informatics(ICEI), Dharwad, India

publications.name: Validating phosphoethanolamine modification as a potential spectral marker of colistin resistance
Validating the utility of heavy water (Deuterium Oxide) as a potential Raman spectroscopic probe for identification of antibiotic resistance
publications.publisher: Spectrochimica Acta Part A: Molecular and Biomolecular Spectroscopy 321 (2024): 124723

achievements.summary: Received TI Global Gold and Silver Recognition Awards owing to my outstanding performance and contributions during Texas Instruments Internship.
Achieved GPA 10 on a scale of 10 in two consecutive semesters in bachelors.
Performed in top 1% Class XII Gujarat State Board examination.
highlights: Awarded Scholarship for Higher Education (SHE) under Innovation in Science Pursuit for Inspired Research (INSPIRE) scheme

achievements.summary: Secured 3rd place in lawn tennis at the Khel Maha Kumbh Gujarat.

extracurricular.summary: Delivered a lecture on significance of game theory on sustainable development at Indo-Finnish Joint Course held at IIT Dharwad.
Represented IIT Dharwad at 12th Inter-IIT Tech Meet hosted by IIT Madras.
Participated in Inter Hostel General Championship 2022 in lawn tennis.
